001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor.encoder;
002
003import com.technototes.library.hardware.Sensored;
004
005/** Interfaces for encoders to use
006 * @author Alex Stedman
007 */
008public interface Encoder extends Sensored {
009    /** zero the encoder
010     *
011     */
012    void zeroEncoder();
013
014    default double getPosition() {
015        return getSensorValue();
016    }
017}
